alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 2:58PM PST until December 10 at 12:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT ABOVE 2000 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO MIDNIGHT PST FRIDAY NIGHT ABOVE 2500 FEET... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory above 2000 feet, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the second Winter Weather Advisory above 2500 feet, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until midnight PST tonight. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from noon Friday to midnight PST Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills
